mission.description: Name of Mission or Telescope reporting the event

instrument.description: Name of the Instrument reporting the event

record_number.description: Incremental number for messages from the instrument during a given trigger (ex: 1, 2, 3)

messenger.description: Messenger of report; EM, GW or Neutrino

spectrum.description: high-energy or optical or radio observations, if not parsed, then default band is energy

units.description: Units of band range, if not parsed, then default energy is keV

filter.description: Optional filter name, as used in optical observations
